docs.text: popchoose How to play Click the artist you think is more popular on Spotify at the moment, according to Spotify's popularity algorithm. Updating If you want to update the local database, run admin.py. This goes to the Last.fm database to create an artist list and then goes to Spotify to get the artist images and popularity scores.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Click the artist you think is more popular on Spotify at the moment, according to Spotify's popularity algorithm.
docs.title: How to play

docs.text: If you want to update the local database, run admin.py. This goes to the Last.fm database to create an artist list and then goes to Spotify to get the artist images and popularity scores.
